#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <math.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
typedef long double ld;
ll mypow(ll a,ll b)
{
	ll x;
	if(b==0)
		return 1;
	else if(b==1)
		return a;
	else if(b%2==0)
	{
		x=mypow(a,b/2);
		return x*x;
	}
	else
	{
		x=mypow(a,b/2);
		return x*x*a;
	}
}
int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t-->0)
	{
		ll n;
		cin>>n;
		int l=(int)round((log2(n)));
		//cout<<l<<endl;
		int flag=0;ll temp;
		for(int i=2;i<=l;i++)
		{
			temp=(ll)round((powl(n,1.0/i)));
			if(mypow(temp,i)==n)
			{
				flag=1;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(flag==1)
			cout<<"YES\n";
		else
			cout<<"NO\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
